sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee desmisal">cdc0c77e2f323010e2bed8492799b662</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7c5bf67a2f323010e2bed8492799b65c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate fileds based on user id</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', g_form.getValue('user_id'));
	gr.query(function(user){
		user.next();
		g_form.setValue('first_name', user.first_name);
		g_form.setValue('Second_name', user.last_name);
		g_form.setValue('company', user.company);
		g_form.setValue('department', user.department);
		g_form.setValue('email', user.email);
	});
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-28 20:53:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d1c3937e2f723010e2bed8492799b65a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate fileds based on user id</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d1c3937e2f723010e2bed8492799b65a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 21:03:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
var first_name = g_form.getValue('first_name');
var second_name = g_form.getValue('Second_name');
g_form.getReference('company', function(record){
			g_form.setValue('email', first_name+'.'+second_name+'@'+record.name+'.com');
					});

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-28 20:01:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c7c74bf22f723010e2bed8492799b6ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate email based on first name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c7c74bf22f723010e2bed8492799b6ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 20:25:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
var first_name =  g_form.getValue('first_name');
var second_name = g_form.getValue('Second_name');
g_form.getReference('company', function(record){
g_form.setValue('email', first_name+'.'+second_name+'@'+record.name+'.com');
					});
	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-28 20:17:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e6bb07b62f723010e2bed8492799b65d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate email based on second name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e6bb07b62f723010e2bed8492799b65d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 20:26:18</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
var first_name = g_form.getValue('first_name');
var second_name = g_form.getValue('Second_name');
g_form.getReference('company', function(record){
			g_form.setValue('email', first_name+'.'+second_name+'@'+record.name+'.com');
					});
	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-29 21:16:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e692689f2f323010e2bed8492799b610</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate email based on first name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e692689f2f323010e2bed8492799b610</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-29 21:31:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
